Text.Page:
In addition to Killian's cruel clowns, his bandmasters and musicians need to be silenced. Kill this unwelcome band and confiscate their instruments of torture.

The success of the federation depends on the demise of the evil deity. Is that understood, ?
Defeat Killian's bandmasters and musicians in the Labyrinth of Terror. The federation needs <PCNAME> now more than ever.
